The attribute `android:allowBackup` is deprecated from Android 12 and higher and may be removed in future versions. Consider adding the attribute `android:dataExtractionRules` specifying an `@xml` resource which configures cloud backups and device transfers on Android 12 and higher.
This folder configuration (`v26`) is unnecessary; `minSdkVersion` is 26. Merge all the resources in this folder into `mipmap-anydpi`.
Do not place Android context classes in static fields (static reference to `UploadHandler` which has field `context` pointing to `Context`); this is a memory leak
